awscli.init:
tmpdir=$(mktemp -d)
cd "$tmpdir" || exit
wget "https://awscli.amazonaws.com/awscli-exe-linux-x86_64.zip" -O "awscliv2.zip"
unzip awscliv2.zip
./aws/install --install-dir /workspace/awscli --bin-dir /workspace/bin
cd || exit
rm -r "$tmpdir"

conveyor.init:
tmpdir=$(mktemp -d)
cd "$tmpdir" || exit
wget https://app.conveyordata.com/api/info/cli/location/linux/amd64 -O c.tar.gz
tar -zxvf c.tar.gz --one-top-level
install c/bin/linux/amd64/conveyor /workspace/bin
install c/bin/linux/amd64/datafy /workspace/bin
cd || exit
rm -r "$tmpdir"

gcloud.init:
GCLOUD_VERSION="402.0.0"
t="$(mktemp -d)"
cd "$t" || exit
wget "https://dl.google.com/dl/cloudsdk/channels/rapid/downloads/google-cloud-cli-${GCLOUD_VERSION}-linux-x86_64.tar.gz" -O gcloud.tar.gz
tar xvfz gcloud.tar.gz
mv google-cloud-sdk /workspace/gcloud
cd || exit
rm -r "$t"

neo.init:
tmpdir=$(mktemp -d)
cd "$tmpdir" || exit
wget https://platform.neo.dna.luminus.be/cli/linux/amd64 -O n.tar.gz
tar zxvf n.tar.gz
install neo /workspace/bin
cd || exit
rm -r "$tmpdir"
